channel.title: Jdk-6u1 - How Do We Use This? (ALSO JDK 1.6
channel.description: Well i've been trying to add this java on my server as JDk1.5 is old now. When i added it i compiled and the CMD said "cannot be specified" i was wondering if someone can post a diffrent edited compiler with jdk-6u1 in it so all i have to do is copy it. Also i got Java 1.6.0 which is confusing :confused:

item.title: Jdk-6u1 - How Do We Use This? (ALSO JDK 1.6
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus

@mwiebelhaus wrote:

i have a whole new compler tut download it and add it to your source

Read full topic

item.title: Jdk-6u1 - How Do We Use This? (ALSO JDK 1.6
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

What he said but paste this in your compiler - Compile.bat

@echo off COLOR 08 title Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin/java.exe" server pause

Read full topic
item.source: Jdk-6u1 - How Do We Use This? (ALSO JDK 1.6

item.title: Jdk-6u1 - How Do We Use This? (ALSO JDK 1.6
item.dc:creator: @Mmmm_Java Mmmm Java
item.description:
@Mmmm_Java wrote:

go to start> right click my computer> properties> go to the advanced tab>click environmental variables

now edit CLASSPATH and insert this in value

"C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\"

edit PATH and insert this for value

C:Windows\System32\;"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\"

and your compile.bat should look something like this

@echo off title TestScape Compiler javac *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: Jdk-6u1 - How Do We Use This? (ALSO JDK 1.6
